mapper.select: select user_id, nickname, email, gender, age, phone_number, join_date, role from users order by user_id desc
select user_id, nickname, email, gender, age, phone_number, join_date, role from users where user_id = #{userId} order by user_id desc
select report_id, reporter_id, post_id, category_id, reported_at, report_category_id from post_report order by report_id desc
select report_id, reporter_id, reply_id, report_category_id, reported_at from reply_report order by report_id desc
